rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A grand entrance with eco-friendly materials and Vastu compliant alignment.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with natural lighting and ventilation. Uses solar passive design principles.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A functional dining space with energy-efficient lighting and ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern eco-kitchen with energy-saving appliances and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Entertainment room designed for luxury with soundproofing and eco-friendly insulation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room with private balcony adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxury master suite with expansive balcony and natural light, ensuring optimal Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Balconied bedroom designed for comfort and Vastu compliance.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Balconied bedroom with natural lighting and eco-friendly materials.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Balconied bedroom with ample space and Vastu oriented design.

rooms.name: Balcony/Outdoor Terrace
rooms.description: Common open balcony space connecting all bedrooms, promoting natural ventilation.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Eco-friendly door with energy-efficient material, oriented towards the east for auspicious entry as per Vastu.

openings.name: Balcony Openings
openings.description: Multiple balcony openings ensuring fresh air circulation and natural light in each bedroom.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Strategically placed windows for optimum ventilation, daylighting, and adherence to Vastu principles.
